feed.title: SUMO: The Scene Understanding and Modeling Challenge Blog

entry.title: SUMO Challenge Launch
entry.summary:
Facebook Reality Labs Launches the Scene Understanding and Modeling (SUMO) Challenge

Facebook Reality Labs is launching the Scene Understanding and Modeling (SUMO) Challenge. The SUMO challenge targets development of comprehensive 3D scene understan...

entry.title: SUMO Challenge is announced
entry.summary: We are announcing the SUMO Challenge at the 2018 Bridges to 3D Workshop, organized by David Fouhey and several of his colleagues.
